hero.title: We are experts from /n large companies /n *(BigTech).*
hero.body: As part of the mentoring program, we can help startups deal with complex legal issues, help find a cost-effective and efficient solution to a legal issue.

howItWorks.title: How it works

body.title: Request
body.body: Before having a call with a mentor, you create a request related to legal topics and the business activities of the startup.

body.title: Analysis
body.body: The executors, if necessary, will contact the author of the request to clarify the details of the request, purpose and desired result.

body.title: Feedback
body.body: We will be happy if you could share with us later whether we were able to resolve your issue, and also if you share your recommendation with other startups

howItWorks.disclaimer: We cannot help with technical issues such as preparation of documents, registration of a legal entity, representation in judicial or other authorities, and others. If in doubt, contact the organizers to clarify the relevance of the issue. Mentoring sessions are organized free of charge.

items.title: Love for technology
items.body: We understand that Tech sphere is a rapidly developing and requires a creative approach and flexible thinking, and thatâ€™s why we love it!

items.title: Honesty
items.body: We respect honesty, so we will always tell you if we can't help with a problem. We also appreciate your feedback.

items.title: Respectful attitude towards work
items.body: We appreciate the work and effort put in by both founders and managers of startups, as well as legal mentors.

items.title: Love for the work we do
items.body: We care about what we do.

items.title: Respect for the founders
items.body: We know that being a startup founder is not easy, so we want to help you find the strategically correct direction and minimize legal and financial risks.
